text: Ojo on kas, ki az coniʙi Parvardigori xud dalele ravsan dorad va zaʙonas ʙa on gujost va pes az in kitoʙi Muso, ki xud pesvovu rahmate ʙudaast, ʙa on guvohi doda, ʙo on kas, ki dalele nadorad, ʙaroʙar ast? Onho ʙa on kitoʙi ravsan imon meovarand. Va har guruhi digare, ki ʙa U kofir savad, cojgohas dar otas ast. Dar on sak makun, ki haq ast va az coniʙi Parvardigorat omadaast. Vale ʙestari mardum imon nameovarand
